changes.description: Enable the heartbeat mechanism by setting `heartbeat_interval` and `heartbeat_timeout` to appropriate values. This will improve connection stability and prevent resource leaks.

Simplify the `EnhancedConnectionManager` class by extracting some of its features into smaller, more focused classes. For example, the rate limiting and connection grouping logic could be moved to separate classes.
Refactor the three WebSocket endpoints into a single endpoint. A parameter in the URL or an initial message from the client can be used to distinguish between connection types.

Replace the `if/elif` chain in `handle_websocket_message` with a more modular design, such as a command pattern or a dictionary-based dispatcher. This will make the code easier to read, maintain, and extend.
